initial.text: The mighty Polytron 4000 stands before you, humming with potential energy. Ancient alien technology awaits activation...

examine_polytron.text: The Polytron 4000 is a marvel of interstellar engineering. There's a distinctive slot that looks like it needs a specific component - the Hyperraumantrieb. Without it, this old radio station will remain silent.

choices.text: I need to find the Hyperraumantrieb

initial.text: Welcome to Brausecus! The finest beverages in the festival. What can I get you?

after_coffee.text: Enjoy your coffee! You look much more energetic now.

initial.text: Resonant - Tattooine Spaceport. The sounds here resonate through space and time. What catches your attention?

choices.text: Investigate the old abandoned petrol pump

spaced_out_man.text: You approach a man who seems to have been awake since long before our time, lost in a galaxy far, far away. He takes a long hit from a fat blunt and mumbles...

druids_response.text: The spaced out man looks through you with glazed eyes and speaks in a distant voice: 'These are not the druids you are looking for...' *takes another hit* He seems completely lost in his own world.

petrol_pump_fly.text: You examine the rusty, abandoned petrol pump from forgotten times. A fat fly buzzes lazily around it, but nothing else seems interesting here.

petrol_pump_watto.text: Through your acid-enhanced vision, the fat fly transforms! You see Watto, the junk dealer, hunched over ancient machinery. His wings buzz as he notices you.

watto_dialogue.text: Watto's wings flutter excitedly: 'Ah! The Hyperraumantrieb you seek, yes? Watto has it, but Watto is very thirsty! Bring me a coffee from the place with the loud music and second row seating, you must!'

watto_completion.text: Watto's eyes light up as he sees the coffee! 'Ahhhh, perfect! Coffee it is! *sips* Now Watto can give you the Hyperraumantrieb!' He hands you a gleaming device.

initial.text: Vacanza - your relaxation destination. Take a break from the festival chaos.
Welcome to the Looserlounge! Where the cool kids hang out and share secrets.

choices.text: What's the word on the street?

initial.text: L300 - Psychedelic stage with mandalas and space music. The air shimmers with otherworldly energy. What draws your attention?

choices.text: Explore the forest behind the bar

mandala_investigation.text: You approach the mesmerizing mandala wheel. Its hypnotic patterns reveal a hidden compartment containing an ancient book of perforated papers in vivid magical colors. The papers seem to pulse with energy...

choices.text: Eat one of the magical paper pieces

forest_exploration.text: Behind the bar, you discover a mystical forest clearing. An ancient oracle sits beneath a glowing tree, her eyes reflecting infinite wisdom.

oracle_wisdom.text: The oracle's voice echoes with ancient knowledge: 'Child of the cosmos, seek what appears as merely a fly to the unenlightened eye. Only those who have tasted the colors of reality shall see the truth that lies within.'

initial.text: Orgia - The wildest party spot at the festival! The energy here is infectious.
The mysterious Lila Drache... Ancient wisdom flows through this purple dragon.
The Nest - A cozy hideaway where festival-goers share stories and resources.
Workshopspace - Learn, create, and collaborate. Knowledge is power here.
2. Reihe - Coffee and House music. The aroma of freshly brewed coffee mixes with pulsing beats. What draws you in?

treehouse.text: You climb up into the mysterious treehouse. The music grows louder, the lights more intense... everything starts spinning... you feel consciousness slipping away...

coffee_stand.text: The coffee stand beckons with the rich aroma of premium beans. The barista looks up expectantly.

choices.text: Get coffee for Watto and yourself
